text: Sir Robert Bartlett Elliott (3 January 1934 â€“ 20 August 2020) was an Australian-born New Zealand medical researcher. He was born in Adelaide, South Australia. In 1970 he moved to the University of Auckland School of Medicine as the foundation professor of paediatrics. In the 1999 New Year Honours, Elliott was appointed a Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit, for services to medical research. Elliott died on 20 August 2020, aged 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand scientists Category:Medical researchers Category:People from Adelaide Category:Scientists from South Australia
title: Bob Elliott (medical researcher)
